text: Sarah Waters (born 21 July 1966) is a Welsh novelist. She is known for novels set in the Victorian era and featuring lesbian protagonists. Her books include Tipping the Velvet and The Night Watch. She was born in Neyland, Pembrokeshire, Wales. She is openly lesbianSarah Waters on being that lesbian writer and lives in London. ==References== Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT novelists Category:Welsh LGBT people Category:Welsh writers Category:1966 births Category:Living people
title: Sarah Waters
